text:
We are using base64 encoded cookie value. until upgrading tomcat5.5.26 everything works correctly. after upgrading if base64 encoded value contains pad('=') then parsed cookie value omits pad. that causes base64 parsing exception.

check this out please!
creator: javanew@korea.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 44679 ***
creator: fhanik@apache.org
